short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change color of Yahoo Finance favicon based on day gain/loss.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes the color of the Yahoo! finance favicon (tab bar icon) based on the current portfolio's day gain/loss.

Open source, see https://github.com/shawnbuso/yahoo_finance_chrome_extension
